name: Motivational Hero
description:
Motivational Hero is a Emotional and Motivational Puzzle-Platformer 2d with levels based in Motivational Analogies

Hard as Hell(Have Invisible Holes in this Level)


Relaxing Gameplay


Analogies


The Motivation you Need


FEATURES


  • 18 Levels with a motivational message
  • Short game, can be beat in a few minutes
  • Motivational and Relaxing Gameplay
  • Achievements
